door_openDuration.description: A string representing duration formatted as defined in ISO 8601. Allowable formats are: P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S, P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]-M[n]-DT[0-23]H[0-59]:M[0-59]:S, and P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[0-23]H[0-59]M[0-59]S. P is mandatory, all other elements are optional, time elements must follow a T.

door_openState.description: The state of the door (open or closed).

door_openAlarm.description: The state of the door open alarm.
